name: Loveland
storyline:
█ days ago, a Mr. "████████" reported "Cult-like" behavior from the residents of the "Loveland Cove" trailer park to the local authorities.

Shortly after, the "Agency" brought Mr. "████████" in for questioning about what he witnessed.

Mr. "████████" indicated that the residents have begun "worshipping" a new species of frog that's emerged from the lake. This has lead to the residents committing various atrocities in the name of the frogs, including, but not limited to, abduction and homicide.

You've have subsequently been dispatched out to the area to investigate these reports, and determine if ███████-class activities have occurred.

Good luck, Detective. We know you'll need it...
summary: Loveland is a low-poly Horror game, in which you take on the role of "The Detective", as you delve into a world of murder, kidnapping, and other atrocities, all at the behest of Frogs
